245 Democrats are not interested in solving any problem posted 4 days ago by Belleoffreedom 11 comments award share report block Mike Lee @BasedMikeLee • 5d Tonight we tried to give relief to unpaid military personnel & federal workers Democrats blocked it Indefensible Mike Lee @SenMikeLee • 5d Democrats just refused to pay the federal workers and American troops hurt by their shutdown. Sending your money to big insurance companies and keeping their Obamacare failure on life support is too important to them.
